mapper.insert: insert into PRODUCT (PRODUCTID, PRODUCTIMAGE, PRODUCTVALUE, PRODUCTNAME, PRODUCTCONTENT,COMPID) VALUES (#{productId}, #{productImage}, #{productValue}, #{productName}, #{productContent},#{compId})
mapper.select: select PRODUCTID, PRODUCTIMAGE, PRODUCTVALUE, PRODUCTNAME, PRODUCTCONTENT, COMPID from PRODUCT where PRODUCTID = #{id}

select p.PRODUCTID, p.PRODUCTIMAGE, p.PRODUCTVALUE, p.PRODUCTNAME, p.PRODUCTCONTENT, p.COMPID, c.COMPNAME from PRODUCT p, COMPANY c where p.COMPID = c.COMPID
and c.COMPID = #{_parameter}
